evidence.text: Person B: Has she ever wandered off before?

Person A: It’s confusing the things she can and can’t chew. Like, she can’t have a salad but last week she ate a cashew?
Person B: You know one of our residents is missing too. Ben Halpern. Are the two of them... involved?
Person B: And she had the TGA, right?
Person A: But she’s a tough cookie. Obviously we want help tracking her down. But there’s still a chance it’s a “going back to the buffet” type situation.
Person B: Where’d our family go?
